original: Benson, Hugo Botv^id, redaktör, Linköping, f. 29/4/03 i Greensburg, Penn., USA, av Nils Juliius B. o. Hanna Bernhardina Benson. G. 36 m. Elin Berg. Barn: Bengt Olof f. 41, Kerstin 44. — Falkenbergs elem:sk., Lunds priv. elem:sk. Res. t. Tyskl., Tjeckosilov. o. Österr. 29, Tyskl. 31-34, Schweiz o. Frankr. 34, Tyskl. 38, Finl. 39. Medarb. i Hallands Nyheter 27-30, Trelleborgs Tidn. 31-35, Ostgöta Correspondenten sed. 36. Ordf. i fören. Ekenäskamraterna fr. starten 44. Hobbies: släktforskning, botanik.
translated: Benson, Hugo Botv^id, editor, Linköping, born April 29, 1903 in Greensburg, Pennsylvania, USA to Nils Juliius B. and Hanna Bernhardina Benson. Married in 1936 to Elin Berg. Children: Bengt Olof (born 1941) and Kerstin (born 1944). Attended Falkenbergs elementary school and Lund's private elementary school. Traveled to Germany, Czechoslovakia, and Austria in 1929, Germany from 1931-1934, Switzerland and France in 1934, Germany in 1938, and Finland in 1939. Worked at Hallands Nyheter from 1927-1930 and Trelleborgs Tidning from 1931-1935, and at Ostgöta Correspondenten since 1936. Became chairman of the association Ekenäskamraterna from the start in 1944. Hobbies include genealogy and botany.
